p: In the wild, HSB is a classic opportunist desert shrub, the proliferation of which largely depends on the current water availability during a given growth season. In arid conditions, the occurrence and intensity of late autumn rain events determine the rate of seed germination and of young seedlings survival. Later on, during winter and early spring, the extents of canopy development, reproductive phase and the duration of the growing season are governed by the intermittent desert precipitation regime [ 51].
